data.name: FSX Steam Edition: Cessna® C208B Grand Caravan® Add-On
data.detailed_description:
Developed by Carenado, the FSX: Steam Edition rendition of the Cessna® C208B Grand Caravan® is a hugely detailed and accurate aircraft. It comes in seven paint schemes, features accurate flight dynamics and realistic instruments including autopilot, custom weather radar and an original GNS 430.

Features:


  • Includes the Cessna® C208B Grand Caravan® with liveries 5 and the Super Cargomaster with 2 liveries.
  • Custom high quality digital stereo sounds recorded directly from a real PT6A engine.
  • Original GNS 430.
  • Interactive virtual cockpit.
  • Customisable panel for controlling seat configuration.
  • External dynamic shadows, internal dynamic shadows on VC, volumetric normal mapping, specular mapping and bloom lights.
  • Full moving parts: Ailerons, elevators, rudders, flaps, rolling wheels and trim tab.
  • Animated sections such as: propeller, doors, windows, sun visors, co-pilot seat and pilot.
  • Detailed PDF documentation.

Virtual Cockpit features:


  • Customisable panel for controlling seat configuration.
  • 3D control knobs in Virtual Cockpit.
  • Realistic night lights effect on virtual cockpit.
  • Autopilot.
  • 3D-modeled pilot, cockpit area and passenger cabin area.
  • Realistic light effects on gauges.
  • Nightlight effects on panel.
  • Separate switches for instruments lights and cabin light.
  • Toggle yoke.

Animations & model features:


  • Cargo Pod.
  • Includes wheel chocks, pitot cover and tail prop stand.
  • Flight dynamics tested by real C208B pilots - real behaviour compared to the real aircraft.
  • Polygon optimized model.
  • Navigation lights, landing and taxi lights.
  • Real weight and balance.
  • Full complement of moving parts: ailerons, elevators, rudders, flaps, rolling wheels and trim tab.
  • Animated sections such as: propeller, doors, windows, sun visors, co-pilot seat and pilot.

data.short_description: Developed by Carenado, the FSX: Steam Edition rendition of the Cessna® C208B Grand Caravan® is a hugely detailed and accurate aircraft. It comes in seven paint schemes, features accurate flight dynamics and realistic instruments including autopilot, custom weather radar and an original GNS 430.

fullgame.name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core).
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required).
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible.
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features.

data.legal_notice: Cessna® C208B Grand Caravan® is a trademark of Textron Innovations Inc. and is used under license to RailSimulator.com Ltd d/b/a/ Dovetail Games.
